<< log elementary functions imag >>

floor

Round down

Syntax

C = floor(A)

Input argument

A

a variable

Output argument

C

result of floor.

Description

floor returns an integer matrix made of nearest rounded down integers.

Example

floor(pi)

See also

round, fix, ceil.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
